casebody.data:
MUCHMORE
v.
TRASK. No. 479P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2008. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, for Muchmore. Michael S. Harrell, John B. McMillan, Raleigh, for Trask.

*897Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 666 S.E.2d 667.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of October 2008 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of October 2008."
